text: void main ( ) { int n = 0 , i = 0 , smtsize = 0 , j = 0 , a [ 1000 ] , b [ 1000 ] [ 1000 ] , k , k1 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & smtsize ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < smtsize ; k ++ ) { for ( k1 = 0 ; k1 < k + 1 ; k1 ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & b [ k ] [ k1 ] ) ; a [ i ] += b [ k ] [ k1 ] ; } } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) printf ( "%d\n" , a [ i ] ) ; }
